comment._content: Is this Gigli, the opera singer? en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Beniamino_Gigli

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Dinh Gilly (July 19, 1877 - May 19, 1940) was a French-Algerian operatic baritone. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dinh_Gilly [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4464311391/]

comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: He has a nose like a boxer -- opera must have been a tougher sport back then.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
He arrived from Europe on the "Kaiser Wilhelm" on November 12, 1913. Caruso was also aboard:

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4465088814/in/photostream/]

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4545372845/]

Other opera singers arrived on the same boat:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4546016812/]
